import Intro from '@site/docs/_lib/_tool-intro-oauth.mdx';

# Issue: Query Tool

<Intro />

## Tool details
**Tool ID:** `portia:linear::query_issues`

**Tool description:** 
        Searches for issues in the Linear account according to one or
        more search criteria. These criteria can include: team, project,
        assignee, status, cycle, and/or one or more keywords that should be included
        in the title or description of the issue. The criteria used to 
        retrieve the issues are extracted from a prompt given by the user.
    

**Args schema:**

          "type": "array"
        },
        {
          "type": "null"
        }
      ],
      "default": null,
